Code: EXEC SQL SELECT T1.NUM_APOL_SINISTRO, T1.OCORHIST, T1.OPERACAO, T1.DTMOVTO, T1.NOMFAV, T1.VAL_OPERACAO, T1.LIMCRR FROM seguros.v0histsini T1, <outra tabela T2> WHERE T1.NUM_APOL_SINISTRO = :NUM_APOL_SINISTRO AND T1.SITUACAO = '0' AND T2.COD_OPERACAO = T1.OPERACAO AND T2.IDE_SISTEMA = 'SI' AND T2.IND_TIPO_FUNCAO = 'IN' AND T2.FUNCAO_OPERACAO = 'LIB' END SQL
